Title: CEDET: Privilege escalation
Synopsis: A vulnerability in CEDET could result in privilege escalation.

Background.Text: CEDET is a Collection of Emacs Development Environment Tools written with the end goal of creating an advanced development environment in Emacs.

Description.Text: An untrusted search path vulnerability was discovered in CEDET.

Impact.Text: A local attacker could escalate his privileges via a specially crafted Lisp expression in a Project.ede file in the directory or a parent directory of an opened file.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All CEDET users should upgrade to the latest version:

NOTE: This is a legacy GLSA. Updates for all affected architectures are
      available since February  01, 2012. It is likely that your system is
      already no longer affected by this issue.
